description: Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, has a requirement to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide Electrical and Propane aerial lift platforms on an as and when required basis at the Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS) located in Halifax, Nova Scotia for the period of 1 October 2022 to 30 September 2025.
duration_in_months: Why do you want software?  [  The estimated duration of this contract is 3 years. ]
